option.name: fileSummaryMaps
option.value: {"C:/Users/nikog/PycharmProjects/PythonProject":"{\"/main.py\":\"This file is a Python program that provides a graphical user interface (GUI) for an estimation calculator. It includes various functions and classes to handle different types of estimations, such as flyers, rotulos, business cards, and copies. The program allows the user to input information and calculates the corresponding prices based on predefined databases.\\n\\n`GUI`: A class that creates the graphical user interface for the estimation calculator.\\n\\n`copy_price`: A function that calculates the price for a copy based on the size, type, quantity, and color of the copy.\\n\\n`copy_calculation`: A function that determines the appropriate column in the database to use for the copy price calculation based on the quantity and whether it is a color or black-and-white copy.\\n\\n`copy_type`: A function that prompts the user to select the type of paper and handles the corresponding price calculations.\\n\\n`copy_quantity_church`: A function that prompts the user for the quantity and whether there is a church discount, then calls the `copy_calculation` function.\\n\\n`copy_sides`: A function that prompts the user to select whether the copy is two-sided or not, then calls the `copy_type` function.\\n\\n`copy_color_select`: A function that prompts the user to select whether the copy is in color or not, then calls the `copy_sides` function.\\n\\n`copy_size_select`: A function that prompts the user to select the size of the copy, then calls the `copy_color_select` function.\\n\\n`rotulo_price`: A function that calculates the price for a rotulo (sign) based on the type, size, and any discounts.\\n\\n`rotulo_type_selection`: A function that prompts the user to select the type of rotulo, then calls the `rotulo_size_selection` function.\\n\\n`rotulo_discount`: A function that prompts the user to select any discounts, then calls the `rotulo_pc` function.\\n\\n`rotulo_pc`: A function that calculates the price per square foot of the rotulo and applies the appropriate discount.\\n\\n`rotulo_size_selection`: A function that prompts the user to enter the size of the rotulo, then calls the `rotulo_discount` function.\\n\\n`menu`: A function that handles the initial selection of the estimation type (flyers, rotulos, business cards, or copies) and calls the appropriate functions.\\n\\n`main`: The main function that creates an instance of the `GUI` class and starts the program.\",\"/gui.py\":\"This file does not contain any classes. It contains the following functions:\\n\\n`get_input`: Retrieves user input from an entry field, converts it to lowercase, and calls the `menu` function with the selected input.\\n\\n`sequence`: Calls the `menu` function with the selected input.\\n\\n`update_bottom`: Updates the text displayed in the bottom label of the GUI.\\n\\n`main`: Starts the main event loop of the Tkinter application.\\n\\nThis file creates a Tkinter GUI application that allows the user to select a quick estimation type and displays the result in the bottom label. The application includes a logo image, a title label, an entry field for user input, and a restart button.\"}"}
